root.name: College Hoops 2K6
root.description: College Hoops 2K6 is the first game in the series to be released on the Xbox 360. Like the other 2K6 sports games, it features a small list of achievements that are extremely basic and easy to obtain.The cover athlete is Marvin Williams, a small forward who played for one year with the University of North Carolina. The Atlanta Hawks drafted him with the second overall pick in the 2005 NBA Draft; in July 2012, the Hawks traded him to the Utah Jazz. UNC coach Roy Williams is featured in the background.
